name: Spins & Transitions
description: Master continuous spinning techniques and seamless transitions.

cards.title: Continuous Wrist Spin
cards.description: A fluid wrist-based spin that maintains momentum.
bulletpoints: Keep the grip relaxed to allow free rotation
Use subtle wrist flicks to maintain speed
cards.summaryText: Let the staff whirl on loose wrists while hand switches stay effortless.

cards.title: Figure Eight Pass
cards.description: A transition where the staff flows through a figure-eight motion between hands.
bulletpoints: Engage your core to guide the movement
Use wrist rotations for better fluidity
Practice both clockwise and counterclockwise motions
cards.summaryText: Flow through figure eights, trading hands to keep transitions silky smooth.
